title: Futbol Americas: MLS All-Star Game Preview
description:
On Monday's episode of Futbol Americas, Sebastian Salazar and Herculez Gomez LIVE from Minnesota preview the MLS All-Star Game. Chicharito, Carlos Vela, Jesús Ferreira, Sebastián Driussi, Sean Johnson, Walker Zimmerman, Julián Araujo, Alexis Vega, Brandon Vazquez join the show to preview the MLS All-Star Game festivities.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Chicharito, Carlos Vela, Jesús Ferreira, among others join the show
